WPD: World Panel Data Visualization and Analysis Toolkit

Source: R/WPD-package.r
WPD.Rd

A comprehensive package for accessing, analyzing and visualizing global economic and social indicators. The package provides tools for working with panel data, with built-in visualization capabilities and data analysis functions.

Main Functions

  • wp_data: Load and filter panel data

  • wp_plot_series: Create time series plots

  • wp_plot_bar: Create bar charts

  • wp_plot_scatter: Create scatter plots

  • wp_info: Get information about available data

Country Code Utilities

  • wp_ctry2iso: Convert country names to ISO3 codes

  • wp_from_iso: Convert ISO codes to country information

  • wp_get_category: Get countries belonging to specific categories

Data

The package includes:

  • Annual and quarterly macroeconomic indicators

  • Cross-country panel data

  • Built-in seasonal adjustment capabilities

  • Efficient on-demand data loading

References

Package website: https://benjaminpeeters.github.io/WPD
